name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Logical identifier for the composition, assigned when created. This identifier stays constant as the composition is changed over time.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Logical identifier for the composition, assigned when created. This identifier stays constant as the composition is changed over time.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The workflow/clinical status of this composition. The status is a marker for the clinical standing of the document.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The workflow/clinical status of this composition. The status is a marker for the clinical standing of the document.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: Specifies the particular kind of composition (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). This usually equates to the purpose of making the composition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Specifies the particular kind of composition (e.g. History and Physical, Discharge Summary, Progress Note). This usually equates to the purpose of making the composition.

name: $class
desc: Returns: A categorization for the type of the composition - helps for indexing and searching. This may be implied by or derived from the code specified in the Composition Type.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A categorization for the type of the composition - helps for indexing and searching. This may be implied by or derived from the code specified in the Composition Type.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Who or what the composition is about. The composition can be about a person, (patient or healthcare practitioner), a device (e.g. a machine) or even a group of subjects (such as a document about a herd of livestock, or a set of patients that share a common exposure).

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Who or what the composition is about. The composition can be about a person, (patient or healthcare practitioner), a device (e.g. a machine) or even a group of subjects (such as a document about a herd of livestock, or a set of patients that share a commo

name: $encounter
desc: Returns: Describes the clinical encounter or type of care this documentation is associated with.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Describes the clinical encounter or type of care this documentation is associated with.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The composition editing time, when the composition was last logically changed by the author.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The composition editing time, when the composition was last logically changed by the author.

name: $author
desc: Returns: Identifies who is responsible for the information in the composition, not necessarily who typed it in.

name: $addauthor
desc: Identifies who is responsible for the information in the composition, not necessarily who typed it in.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Identifies who is responsible for the information in the composition, not necessarily who typed it in.

name: $title
desc: Returns: Official human-readable label for the composition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Official human-readable label for the composition.

name: $confidentiality
desc: Returns: The code specifying the level of confidentiality of the Composition.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The code specifying the level of confidentiality of the Composition.

name: $attester
desc: Returns: A participant who has attested to the accuracy of the composition/document.

name: $addattester
desc: A participant who has attested to the accuracy of the composition/document.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A participant who has attested to the accuracy of the composition/document.

name: $custodian
desc: Returns: Identifies the organization or group who is responsible for ongoing maintenance of and access to the composition/document information.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the organization or group who is responsible for ongoing maintenance of and access to the composition/document information.

name: $relatesTo
desc: Returns: Relationships that this composition has with other compositions or documents that already exist.

name: $addrelatesTo
desc: Relationships that this composition has with other compositions or documents that already exist.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Relationships that this composition has with other compositions or documents that already exist.

name: $event
desc: Returns: The clinical service, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented.

name: $addevent
desc: The clinical service, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The clinical service, such as a colonoscopy or an appendectomy, being documented.

name: $section
desc: Returns: The root of the sections that make up the composition.

name: $addsection
desc: The root of the sections that make up the composition.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The root of the sections that make up the composition.
